title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Foundations of Database-Driven Instructional Design Project Management

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain database structure design principles for instructional design project management.
Learners can manage instructional design schedules and resources using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can establish a database-driven communication system in a small team project environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
